review: I used to own chromecast but sold it because I can only cast non-amazon content.  FireTV stick is essentially a stick version of FireTV or Kindle tablets.  I can watch amazon prime instant video and amazon mp3 as prime member which I could not do with crhomecast.  I seriously doubt whether it can play game because you need to install the game on stick that only has few gb space.  I wish amazon could've improve in following areas.1. I plug firetv stick into one of the 6 HDMI on my receiver.  Because the usb cable is on the side, it blocks the neighboring hdmi.2. youtube quality is not as good as chromecast.3. I wish kindle ebook reader be added in the future.

review: I love my new fire stick! I wanted it for an upstairs bedroom for when I wanted to watch netflix or prime upstairs. I like the trivia comes, like you don't know jack. The remote is sensitive and occasionally lags. Startup is fast and simple. I love that I have spotify but I think it's stupid that I still have to play it on my phone instead of logging into my account and syncing my account to the stick. But since I don't have a speaker doc for my phone, it works. For the price this works great for what I want. I can't say that it's probably much better than a roku 3 stick or anything, so it falls in line with all of those others.
